name: Pink on the Inside
description:
Its halloween guys! Or at least it was halloween... Yeah im late i know and dont really care.

Youre a graveyard keeper, one night you decide to go on a walk on the graveyard BUT suddenly! Evil, flesh eating slimes appeared! Its you or them now! Good thing youve got your revolver with you.

CONTROLS: WASD to walk, LMB to shoot, RMB to dodge, Space or ESC to pause/unpause.
